column3:
Please see #7687 and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7551#issuecomment-209852807

I would really prefer that importscript was a separate RPC implementation without all the magic effects of matching with addresses.
I agree with @sipa. If you add a new method, make use of that opportunity to add a saner interface.\n

I actually think the interface is (mostly) sane...indeed, adding a non-P2SH address is strangely handled, indeed. But the fact that imported addresses are treated as change (#7687) is a separate bug. You still need to be able to hand it a script and have it generate the P2SH address (optionally, sometimes you dont want this). importscript should probably be pretty much what it is here, IMO.\n
I still believe that importscript should not copy all the magic behaviour of importaddress.\n
Closing in favor of other solutions.\n
